website_summaries.verdict: This super grippy traction pad is forgiving on your skin and wears and tears as well as more expensive pads at a much lower cost.
pros: Super grippy but soft on skin
Measures 12 by 12 inches when all three pieces are laid side by side
Surface is forgiving on your skin
cons: Created for surfboards, but  many love it so much they use it for skimboards, onewheels, and other equipment

customer_reviews.title: Really sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Just to compare, I bought 2 of these and 2 others that were about 5 bucks cheaper on Amazon. After a 12 day surf trip, the results were clear! The other China brand came off in three pieces on day 2, 3 and 4🤐 Ho Stevie was perfectly stuck to the board and looked like new. I ended up returning the 2nd China one which we never used. Ho Stevie is the real deal, don't cheap out! You will end up polluting the ocean with trash that doesn't hold up in the water.
customer_reviews.author: CountryMom

customer_reviews.title: STOKED
customer_reviews.text: Been a while since I've purchased a pad. Got a new board, needed a pad and realized everything in the shops appeared to be price fixed at $35. Almost went Mason Ho style and ditched the pad until I saw this traction. Thought I'd give it a try for the bargain price. Arrived within a couple days and I was stoked to see the quality once I got it. Through it on my new CI Rocket 9 and have been stoked with how it's felt, good stick, good feel, great control and aesthetic. Hoooo Braaaaa SHAKASSS
customer_reviews.author: Grahm

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks good, adhesisve is doing great so far
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, looks good, reasonably priced, and after ~10 sessions it's not coming off:) Application process that worked well for me: First check that the two side pads have identical shapes -- yup, seemed they cut it precisely. Then pencil mark the leading and trailing edges of the middle pad and line the marks up on the stringer -- of your extremely clean board. Peel back the adhesive covering slightly (~1cm) at the leading edge, apply it to the board, press firmly, peel some more, press, ... Similarly for the side pads. Then press all over the pads for another few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jdm

customer_reviews.title: I like the comfort and style of the pad
customer_reviews.text: I first started surfing back in 1960 when I bought my first board, a 9'2" Dewey Weber. In 1998 I purchased my present board a G&S thruster. Since gaining a little weight. I found it now necessary to stiffen my board a bit. So I did all the work making ding repairs and then adding a new 4 oz layer of glass to stiffen the board. The traction pad is just because of my style. I like the comfort and style of the pad. Thanks, much. Dennis pointbreakrider, retired US Army 1/27 inf
customer_reviews.author: Wolfhound Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Shred knar chunks with this rad pad
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these trackpads. One on a fish and one on a shortboard. So far the short board has held up for over a year. The fish pad is brand new and I love it. Thanks Stevie
customer_reviews.author: Decker Bros

customer_reviews.title: SEND ITTTTTTTTTTT FOR PALM TREES
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the palm trees. I have been skimboarding at the wedge for a week with them on and the 3M adhesives hold pretty well. No signs of peeling. NOW THE HOW TO: Make sure you clear out any wax, sand, etc. and use a Windex to clean the surface. Wait a while to let dry, and apply the pads. Wait 24 hours and hit the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lebroski

customer_reviews.title: This one didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I've generally been pleased with Ho Stevie but this one didn't work. I cleaned my board well before putting the pads on but they still fell off soon afterward. The adhesive was not good at all. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Hold
customer_reviews.text: This surfboard pad has held up well and looks really nice on my surfboard. It has lasted almost a year on my board and has impressively survived a lot of time through the water regardless of the cheaper price. It is a nice design and the bigger bump on the back makes it really easy to both stay on and duck dive with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Helped my son learn to stay on his board!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, our son has been struggling to stay in his skin board. He had grown frustrated and was losing confidence. This product helped him immediately. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  Jack

customer_reviews.title: LIKE GLUE
customer_reviews.text: Being a skimboarder for 10 years comes along with an acquired taste for only certain types of traction, I'm extremely picky when it comes down to getting the right shaped and textured pads for my boards especially the back pads. I bought this because the price was fair and I wanted to throw some traction on an old board that didn't previously have anything on it. Let me tell you, it was like glue riding on it today for the first time. Perfect blend of comfort and stability. Thank you Ho Stevie! I can proudly say that I'll only be buying this traction from now on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Yeah Stevie!
customer_reviews.text: Watched Ben Gravy's videos and saw the Ho Stevie products show up, figured what the heck, bought, and applied this pad to a new formie I bought, the adhesive sticks really well and the bump on the pad feels very nice. I am using this pad to help me pop up chicken wing style, should help tremendously. I will update as I use this board. Update: I've surfed on this board five times now and all the seasons I've had with this pad it has performed wonderfully, it is comfy, the bump has helped me tremendously on my pop ups and it is holding up well, no tearing. There is no sign of the adhesive wearing out. Wonderful product! Yew!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This traction pad was everything as advertised. The glue is very sticky and I doubt it will come up easily. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, so can't vouch for long term durability, but it seems like very similar quality to my Dakine, Creatures, Gorilla, and other traction pads I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: It Works !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for someone else. He is very pleased with it. Works as it was intended. So it was a good choice for performance and value.
customer_reviews.author: lilly zale

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the big boys
customer_reviews.text: This pad is sticky and feels good on the feet. No issues with this yet, seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: MIsterAyche

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Actually my friend orders these deck pads and bought me a pad. I like it, ordered another one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Best traction pad for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pad; very grippy and cushiony (is that even a word?), but without the harder edged grip pattern of most traction pads. Well worth the price. The only thing I'd consider improving is the size. An extra piece to go in front of the pad would be good for bigger boards (mine is on a 6'5"). -Amanda's husband
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Austensen

customer_reviews.title: Great traction pad
customer_reviews.text: Great trac pad. Nice and sticky underfoot but still soft and buttery on the tootsies.
customer_reviews.author: John Stockel Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my new board, and I am very happy with it. It's a little shorter than some others, and I like that as it helps me get my back foot in the right spot. At half the price and minimal wasteful packaging, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Kevincent

customer_reviews.title: Surfboard traction pad
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to install and the 3M adesive is really efficient. Its back tail has a perfect size to avoid the foot sleepers out of the board
customer_reviews.author: Rony Cachola

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great service
customer_reviews.text: My son loves your traction pad. He said it is made well and it works well on his boards. This is the second time he has bought your traction pad. Product was delivered quickly and packaged properly. Thank you for your great service and great product.
customer_reviews.author: AvoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great traction
customer_reviews.text: This has great traction as well as a cool design with the palm trees.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Ready to shred!
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other Ho Stevie gear, the stomp pad is fantastic. Easy to put on and works like a charm. High quality products that work real well, look cool and affordable as usual. This along with the leash and fins complete my Ho Stevie setup on my favorite board! I couldn't be happier with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: very nice and cute
customer_reviews.text: very nice pad for my new surfboard, love it, super sticky like other brands, LOVE THOSE PALM TREES on turquoise color!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just put the thing on this morning, and surfed it an hour later. Felt great under my feet. I have never gotten a complement on a track pad before today, but some some stopped me to tell me how cool it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Best roof rack
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my car roof , great for holding surfboards
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: It is super awesome! And you gotta support the homie.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Lots of grip! Lots of style! Looks clean! And just makes you feel good on the board. Just well made all around item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanj.cota

customer_reviews.title: Best pad
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it on long but great pad for price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very good grip
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to use the pad, I put it on a board that I am saving for summer
customer_reviews.author: Steve N.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: too small for my wide board. had to return it
customer_reviews.author: joe mac

customer_reviews.title: Center pad is high with lots of arch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Installed on a wakesurf board. Only dislike is the center pad is raised much higher than any pad i've had before. For lack of a better term I'd describe it as having extremely high arch support, so much so I'm contemplating removing just the center portion and looking for something a little flatter. I'm going to ride it a few more times to see if after some wear it flattens a bit. Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: Safety_3rd

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Plain and simple, easily applied it to my board. I have surfed with it for about 2 months and everything seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Huskey

customer_reviews.title: very weak
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this only for couple months, the board I use this is not the one I use frequently. However, this pad already came off. Very low quality
customer_reviews.author: Yuki Inoue

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Traction Pad Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before my surf trip to Nicaragua and it's my favorite traction pad yet!! It looks amazing on my Hypto Krypto. Installing the traction pad was really easy, and it stuck to my board perfectly (unlike many other overpriced traction pads out there). The grip is amazing and will help you keep your back foot planted. Love this product and would recommend it to anyone looking for a traction pad that looks great, does its job, and is fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan Kara

customer_reviews.title: This is Great
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best trackpads you can find for this price over all. Great product and it works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Piagetti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ho Stevie products ! I have fins from them too future and fcs twin keeps
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Red Palmtree Stomp Pad Yes Please!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and feels great. Unique palm tree design is awesome, seller even sent instructions on how to install. They also checked in to see how I liked it. Great customer service follow up and awesome product Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Efren

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome
customer_reviews.text: O Bought it last year, um Brazil,o like it só much,i bought it again tô take kg back ti Brazil and use it there
customer_reviews.author: LILIAN LAMHUT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Placed this product on my Onewheel and love it! Had to modify it a tad but made a world of difference on the foot control for carving up the terrain. First class!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Kasten

customer_reviews.title: 5'7" biscuit
customer_reviews.text: Product applies as good as the big name brands. I can't wait to try it! The adhesive is real sticky. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Internet Hobo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little tract pad. easy to apply on my new 6'6" and get helping me learn to duck dive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Killa!!!
customer_reviews.text: Killa stomp pad! Using on my custom made SUPs I built for stand-up paddle surfing. Super lightweight and they hold up great...
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping! Quality product. Easy to install. What more could you need in a traction pad.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking trac pad. Haven't used it yet, waiting for the water to warm up!
customer_reviews.author: Solas88

customer_reviews.title: was easy to work with and the product is great
customer_reviews.text: Ho Stevie! was easy to work with and the product is great. It was delivered fast and the instructions were detailed yet clear and the traction pad now resides on my favorite board. A+++++ rating!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good one the glue is working perfect after many uses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best traction for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome high quality pad. Comparable to the Pro-lite and Freak pads. Doesn’t retain water and light. So far bought 3. My friends who have borrowed my boards also love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not slippery at all
customer_reviews.text: Traction pad was AMAZING can surf very well with it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and good grip
customer_reviews.text: Took my Onewheel to the next level with these. Super good for winter because snow and ice do not stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: It's great, was a little worried it wouldn't be grippy ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great, was a little worried it wouldn't be grippy enough, but I took it out when it was 6-7 on a super steap break and my foot didn't slip once
customer_reviews.author: david robnett

customer_reviews.title: Good traction pad
customer_reviews.text: Good traction pad. Arch bar is located right where I like it close to the kick and not too big. Really locks onto your back foot well and allows you to push hard through your turns. 3M adhesive is working well. Good deal for a great traction pad.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Delivered the following day
customer_reviews.text: Traction pad quality is great, not to mention how simple it was to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 3M sticks well and went on my board easy. Looks good to boot
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a novice when it comes to surfing, but this pad has helped serve as a technique reminder when popping up. Gotta get on that back foot! The 3M sticks well and went on my board easy. Looks good to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality pad - highly recommend. This is the third one I buy for my quiver.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, I returned immediately. You get what you pay for folks
customer_reviews.author: Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice traction pad for about half the price as popular surf brands. Paired it with the front pad. Good for my surfboard and Wakesurf board.
customer_reviews.author: Kshred7

customer_reviews.title: Best pad I have purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Have had no problems with the pad peeling off my board.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Traction pads are of very good quality. Exactly what I was looking for. Planning to give to my son for Christmas to use on his skimboard. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: take off wax
customer_reviews.text: My traction pad came off the first time I used it. Make sure you get ALL the wax off your board before you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: brad nelson

customer_reviews.title: Simple and good size
customer_reviews.text: Simple cost effective traction pad. I love the fact that it is 12" x 12" and not some small pad that wont fit on the tail of a regular board. I have already purchased a third for the next board.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pad. Looks like a great store. I will buy there again. A++
customer_reviews.author: barak izko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pad!
customer_reviews.text: Received my new pad two days after ordering! As soon as it came the surf went flat so I haven’t been able to test it out, but the quality is great and the 3M adhesive really stuck to the board. The palm tree graphics look great and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: James Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to apply! My 13 year old did it himself. He loves having the added traction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for an accessible price. Good quality and design
customer_reviews.author: Hp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sticks and holds awesome. Will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for not to bad of a price and ...
customer_reviews.text: Stoked about this traction pad from Ho Stevie! Good quality for not to bad of a price and quick shipping. Really helped my turns too, definitely would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Same quality as popular brands but lower price.

customer_reviews.title: Great pad, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pad, and at this price it's a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: glenda holland

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and seems durable enough for a lower priced pad
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and seems durable enough for a lower priced pad. Might not have the same traction as a higher end pad, but it'll do the job for my hack around fish board. 4 stars bc it's new and I've only used it once, I'd give it 5 if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: I put it on top of the left over glue of my old trackpad and it still sticks nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Sick trackpad, I put it on top of the left over glue of my old trackpad and it still sticks nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and grip
customer_reviews.text: Stuck very well to my board! Excellent design and grip. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: paul stirm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great traction pad, great price. You can't go wrong with Ho Stevie! I love their products.
customer_reviews.author: CRosa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product at a great price with fast shipping. will reorder again.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best grip pads I ever used comfortable and sticks great
customer_reviews.author: Eric Martinus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Pad is very good! Thanks for your post attention
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PAD!!! It is insane / It is from Ho Stevie! / Killer quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pad! It has a great feel and texture to it, I am waiting for my new board to arrive and I have had a good chance to check this out. It has a softer feel to it so I don't think it will knurl your knee when you are wearing your boardies and it feels excellent traction wise! Really good size too 12" and it will cover your tail quite nicely when spread. Ho Stevie has been one of my favs on YouTube for years and I am glad to give the support for his wonderful contribution to all of us! Support!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product love it !! Package came on time !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All 3 Pieces Sold Separately?
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, only the middle section of the 3 piece traction pad was in the envelope. Waste of money now followed by a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Malach

product_meta.title: Ho Stevie! Premium Surfboard Traction Pad [Choose Color] 3 Piece, Full Size, Maximum Grip, 3M Adhesive, for Surfing or Skimboarding
feature_bullets: 🥇 PREMIUM QUALITY - Other traction pads on Amazon claim to be high quality, but they are smaller and the adhesive is not as good. You know you are getting quality with Ho Stevie!
🏄‍♂️ SUPER GRIPPY, yet soft on your knees if you surf in boardshorts.
👣 FULL SIZE PAD - 12”x12” when all 3 pieces are laid side by side. Spread the pads apart if you prefer a wider grip on your tail.
💪 POWERFUL 3M ADHESIVE provides maximum stick to your board. (Some cheaper products claim to use 3M adhesive, but you can check their reviews and see that the pads often come off the board)
💯 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: As with all of our products, if you are not completely satisfied for ANY reason, simply return it within 30 days for a full refund.
